body:
Hello guys this forum post is about BlackSniper's ban,



I think he should be un- banned, I know I got him banned but he didn't intend to advertise. I think he should get one more chance maybe just  temp-ban for a couple days or weeks but I do not think he should have been given this perm ban, PeachyYas I know I told you it wouldn't be right to let a temp-ban, But I think its true he should get another chance, the game wasn't even super popular it was like a 8 person game. He has also spent much time on the avicus network if you see in his profile 14 days!!! prestige 3 and a donor, if you see on his infractions he has only gotten kicks... this is his first ban, he supports avicus a lot and plays lots, Even if you don't think it's fair to let this slide, think about how you let my brother slide? this wouldn't be the first acceptation in bans, 

Best regards, Cezbla
